title: 28 SGC-graded T206 cards of HOFers on eBay
author: wolverinejayhawks

posts.post_title: 28 SGC-graded T206 cards of HOFers on eBay
posts.post_content:
I am auctioning most of my SGC set registry collection of T206 Hall of Fame players on eBay this week. (I am keeping Cobb, Mathewson and a few others for sentimental reasons).

You can find a link to the auctions here: [url]http://www.ebay.com/usr/wolverinejayhawks[/url]

There are 28 different HOFer T206 cards between SGC 10 and SGC 50 with most around SGC 30, so they will be affordable to many collectors.  Auctions end Monday night, 2-27.

Thanks for reading,

Vince (aka wolverinejayhawks)
